properties.description: Posted by Rri

properties.name: ERITREA | 20 Coaches
properties.description: Posted by RriIn February 2003, RHS&A trained 5 regional health staff on launching and supporting RRIs. Over a period of 6 months, each Region in the country launched a portfolio of RRIs targeting HIV/AIDS prevention and care. Read more in English Read more in French In School-based HIV/AIDS prevention, this effort evolved into hundreds of RRIs in the Central Region. Read more [ link to Michael Beasley\'s report, turn into .pdf file] Currently, Eritrean RRI coaches continue to organize improvement efforts in the Minsitry of Health, using the disciplines and tools they practiced in their intial RRIs.

properties.name: ERITREA | 5 RRI Coaches

Over a period of 6 months, each Region in the country launched a portfolio of RRIs targeting HIV/AIDS prevention and care. Currently, Eritrean RRI coaches continue to organize improvement efforts in the Minsitry of Health, using the disciplines and tools they practiced in their intial RRIs.

properties.name: GHANA | 15 Coaches
properties.description: Posted by RriThe Institute trained CBRDP zonal coordinators, regional directors and selected district council staff on the Rapid Results Approach in October 2006. After this 3-day training, the Institute team guided two of the newly trained RRI Coaches through the launch and implementation of 12 start-up RRIs in Central and Eastern Regions. Click Here to view some outcomes of first wave of RRIs Currently, these RRI coaches are getting ready to support similar RRIs in all 10 Regions of the country.

properties.description: Posted by Rri

properties.name: Hirut
properties.description: Posted by Rri

properties.name: K E N Y A | 12 Coaches
properties.description: Posted by RriRHS&A trained 12 private sector consultants in June 2005, and supported them through the launch of 16 RRIs in the Ministry of Water during the summer of 2005. Three RHS&A interns accompanied the newly trained RRI coaches through the launch and 100 day implementation cycles. Currently, several of these coaches form the core support group for a government-wide effort to use RRIs as a cornerstone of the public sector reform program

properties.name: K Village 1
properties.description: Posted by Rri

properties.name: MADAGASCAR | 50 Coaches
properties.description: Posted by Rri" | View Show | Create Your Own"

properties.name: MADAGASCAR | 50 Coaches
properties.description: Posted by RriBetween February 2005 and April 2006, RHS&A and the Institute trained 20 private sector consultants and 22 regional health coordinators (staff of the Ministry of Health), and 22 regional coordinators for the National Commission in the Fight against HIV/AIDS (CNLS). Immediately thereafter the Institute team guided newly trained coaches through implementing their first waves of RRIs in Health, HIV/AIDS prevention, and economic development. These coaches have in turn trained other government staff at the central and regional levels. To date, this growing network has supported more than 100 RRIs in Health (repprodutive Health, nutrition, safe motherhood), more than 20 RRIs in HIV/AIDS, more than 40 RRIs in commune-level tax collection, and more than 20 RRIs in judiciary reform. Click Here to view the latest developments on the Madagsacar RRI web-site.

properties.name: MADAGASCAR | 50 Coaches
properties.description: Posted by RriBetween February 2005 and April 2006, RHS&A and the Institute trained 20 private sector consultants and 22 regional health coordinators (staff of the Ministry of Health), and 22 regional coordinators for the National Commission in the Fight against HIV/AIDS (CNLS). Immediately thereafter the Institute team guided newly trained coaches through implementing their first waves of RRIs in Health, HIV/AIDS prevention, and economic development. These coaches have in turn trained other government staff at the central and regional levels. To date, this growing network has supported more than 100 RRIs in Health (repprodutive Health, nutrition, safe motherhood), more than 20 RRIs in HIV/AIDS, more than 40 RRIs in commune-level tax collection, and more than 20 RRIs in judiciary reform. Click Here to view the latest developments on the Madagsacar RRI web-site.

properties.name: S Village 1
properties.description: Posted by RriThe Institute trained CBRDP zonal coordinators, regional directors and selected district council staff on the Rapid Results Approach in October 2006. After this 3-day training, the Institute team guided two of the newly trained RRI Coaches

properties.name: SIERRA LEONE (20 Coaches)
properties.description: Posted by RriIn June 2004, RHS&A trained 12 Sierra Leonian professionals as RRI coaches, who supported the post-conflict newly elected local government leaders to provide the most critical social services, such as safe water provision and garbage collection. A total of nineteen RRIs were launched by these coaches. Currently, the core group of RRI coaches has grown to 20, who are supporting a third wave of RRIs. One of these waves focused on elevating the performance of the Ministry of Health teams that were devolved to the districts as part of a national deventralization effort. Read more in english [Link to http://www.worldbank.org/afr/findings/english/find261.pdf] Read more in French [Link to http://www.worldbank.org/afr/findings/french/261f.pdf ]
